text: ['Asalin hoton, Getty Images', 'Sabon kociyan Manchester United, Ruben Amorim zai ja ragamar wasa tara kafin bikin Kirsimeti, wanda ke fatan mayar da ƙungiyar kan ganiya.', 'Kociyan ya maye gurbin Erik ten Hag, bayan da United ke kasa taka rawar gani a wasannin kakar bana.', 'Cikin wasa tara da Amorim zai ja ragamar United kafin Kirsimeti, ya haɗa da karawar Premier biyar da Europa League biyu da kuma League Cup.', 'Kociyan zai fara da zuwa Ipswich Town a gasar Premier League ranar Lahadi daga nan ya karɓi bakuncin Bodo a Europa League ranar Alhamis 28 ga watan Nuwamba.', 'Wasa na uku United za ta kece raini da Everton a Premier a Old Trafford ranar 1 ga watan Disamba, sannan ta je Arsenal a karawar hamayya ranar 4 ga watan Disamba.', 'Ranar 7 ga watan Disamba Nottingham Forest za ta je United a gasar Premier ranar 7 ga watan Disamba, daga nan United ta je Viktoria a Europa League ranar 12 ga watan Disamba.', 'Za a buga wasan hamayya tsakanin Manchester City da United ranar 15 ga watan Disamba, sai United ta buga League Cup zagayen kwata fainal da Tottenham ranar 19 ga watan Disamba.', 'Daga nan United za ta fafata da Bournemouth a Premier a Old Trafford ranar 22 ga watan Disamba.', 'Premier League Lahadi 24 ga watan Nuwamba', 'Europa League Alhamis 28 ga watan Nuwamba', 'Premier League Lahadi 1 ga watan Disamba', 'Premier League Laraba 4 ga watan Disamba', 'Premier League Asabar 7 ga watan Disamba', 'Europa League Alhamis 12 ga watan Disamba', 'Premier League Lahadi 15 ga watan Disamba', 'English League Cup Alhamis 19 ga watan Disamba', 'Premier League Lahadi 22 ga watan Disamba', '© 2024 BBC. BBC ba za ta dauki alhakin abubuwan da wasu shafukan daban suka wallafa ba.  Karanta hanyoyin da muke bi dangane da adireshin waje.', 'Abin da ya sa ƴanbindiga ke samun wurin zama a arewacin Najeriya', 'Yaƙin Rasha da Ukraine: Shin Trump zai iya tabbatar da tsagaita wuta?', 'An gano yaɗuwar wani sikari mai illa a Najeriya', 'Cocin Katolika a Kenya ya ƙi karɓar kyautar dala 40,000 daga shugaban ƙasar', 'Majalisar malaman Musulunci ta nemi a dakatar da ƙudurin harajin Tinubu', 'Hikayata 2024: Labarai 15 da suka yi fice a bana', 'Saƙon da Mahamat Deby ya ce mu faɗa wa Tinubu game da Boko Haram - Ribadu', 'Hare-haren Turkiyya a Syria sun jefa mutum miliyan ɗaya cikin ƙangin rashin ruwa', 'Yadda ƴanbindiga suka cinna wa gonaki wuta a Zamfara', 'Zaɓen Ghana: Wane ne ɗantakarar shugabancin Ghana Mahamudu Bawumia?', "Abin da ya faru a kotu game da shari'ar Hamdiyya Sidi a jihar Sokoto"]
